https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eouirg9SUmZ0QEQipaNgLFjHVdg.jpg Bimawl, an honest government officer, lives an apparently happy conjugal life with his wife Mouli. Things change when Mouli's college friend visits their home. Abaidha - The Demolition Man
